dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5714 EH: Pest Management Records Modernization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To permit commercial applicators of pesticides to create, retain, submit, and convey pesticide application-related records, reports, data, and other information in electronic form.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Pest Management Records Modernization Act
.

section.header: Use of electronic records by commercial applicators of pesticides to comply with recordkeeping and reporting requirements

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any contrary provision of Federal, State, or local law, commercial applicators of pesticides, including commercial applicators of restricted use pesticides, may create, retain, submit, and convey a pesticide application-related record, report, data, or other information in electronic form in order to satisfy any requirement for such creation, retention, submission, or conveyance, respectively, under any Federal, State, or local law.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 2, 2014.
